channel.title: One Question
channel.description:
Okay..How would I make an Aggressive Npc, how do I edit his stats/max hit, And how would I make him Drop things?
Thanks for any of your help, And thanks for At least Looking :)
EDIT: Came up with another question..
I was going to try to make my OWN pking rewards system, I would Probably put it in the music tab as nothing is in there. But I Dont know where I would start..If anyone Could get me started (don't just give me a code to copy and paste, I want to do this on my own) It would be GREATLY appreciated.
Thanks Again

item.title: One Question
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

Woops, forgot to add that part :o I want it in the music tab, since it’s not being used for anything else

item.description:
